title: WCD AP Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for 69 Anganwadi Worker & Helper Posts
description: The Women and Child Development, Andhra Pradesh (WCD Andhra Pradesh) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 69 Anganwadi Worker & Helper Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th can apply for the WCD AP Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selecti...
